positions.title: Undergraduate Research Associate
positions.description_html:
Examined the impact and synergies of Innovative Finance Mechanisms focusing on biodiversity conservation in Africa (Accepted at Finance and Accounting 2022 Annual Research Symposium, IFABS Naples 2022, and Euro Working Group for Financial modelling Conference). 

Part of the consortium (led by University of Hamburg) working on a grant application to study replication and upscaling of Nature-based Solutions in Europe

Developing the mechanism of Wetland Coin, a novel approach for pricing wetland mitigation credits (Extended abstract was presented at accepted at AITNER, 2024)

Drafted a literature review on the attempts to value, quantify, and trade ecosystem services with special emphasis on Mangroves and wetlands (presented at Sustainable Development Conference 2021, SEBI-NISM Financial markets conferenceMarkets Conference, and AIB US West Conference 2022)

Contributed to the theoretical framework of a comparative housing study for the cities of Vienna, Lombardy, Singapore and Shenzen for comparing the financing mechanisms and institutional arrangements. 

Constructed a business case study encompassing various strategic tools utilized by Multi-national firms of various sectors to tackle malaria in developing countries (Presented at Business Alliance against Malaria symposium 2021).

Contributed to an adaptation of the Acclaimed book titled Financial Management by Berk and DeMarzo in the context of emerging markets, with numerous parallel mini-case studies (To be published by Pearson).
